name: Last Second Cleaning Company
description:
You play as an employee from the Last Second Cleaning Company who pride themselves on their fast cleaning service. Run around frantically to vacuum every pieces of trash laying around with your super vacuum cleaner and rewind the room into their former glory for when the clients come home.

Controls:

- Keyboard and mouse:
          WASD - to move
          Mouse - to aim
          Space - to interact
          LeftMouseButton - to vacuum
         RightMouseButton - to blow

- GamePad:
          Left thumbstick - to move
          Right thumbstick - to aim
          South button ( A or X ) - to interact
          Right trigger - to vacuum
          Left trigger - to blow
